Underhill 37 * Contact: john.underhill@protonmail.com 38 */ 39 40 41 #ifndef QSC_WINUTILLS_H 42 #define QSC_WINUTILLS_H 43 44 #include "common.h" 45 46 #if defined(QSC_SYSTEM_OS_WINDOWS) 47 52 #define QSC_WINTOOLS_ATTRIBUTES_BUFFER_SIZE 256 53 58 #define QSC_WINTOOLS_NETSTAT_BUFFER_SIZE 1024 59 64 #define QSC_WINTOOLS_NETSTAT_NAME_SIZE 256 65 70 #define QSC_WINTOOLS_PROCESS_LIST_SIZE 16384 71 76 #define QSC_WINTOOLS_REGISTRY_BUFFER_SIZE 1024 77 82 #define QSC_WINTOOLS_REGISTRY_LIST_SIZE 8192 83 88 #define QSC_WINTOOLS_RUNAS_BUFFER_SIZE 260 89 94 #define QSC_WINTOOLS_SERVICE_LIST_SIZE 16384 95 100 #define QSC_WINTOOLS_SERVICE_BUFFER_SIZE 512 101 106 #define QSC_WINTOOLS_SERVICE_LIST_DESCRIPTION 107 112 //#define QSC_WINTOOLS_SERVICE_LIST_ACTIVE_ONLY 113 114 typedef enum qsc_winutils_registry_value_types 115 { 116 REG_SZ_TYPE, 117 REG_DWORD_TYPE, 118 REG_QWORD_TYPE, 119 REG_BINARY_TYPE 120 } qsc_winutils_registry_value_types; 121 125 typedef enum qsc_winutils_service_states 126 { 127 QSC_WINUTILS_SERVICE_START, 128 QSC_WINUTILS_SERVICE_STOP, 129 QSC_WINUTILS_SERVICE_PAUSE, 130 QSC_WINUTILS_SERVICE_RESUME 131 } qsc_winutils_service_states; 204 212 QSC_EXPORT_API bool qsc_winutils_registry_key_delete(const char* keypath); 213 223 QSC_EXPORT_API size_t qsc_winutils_registry_key_list(char* result, size_t reslen, const char* keypath); 224 233 QSC_EXPORT_API bool qsc_winutils_run_executable(const char* path);
